attributes.action: disclose the hidden agenda of the Bilderberg Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are none of the meetings disclosed in the press?  What is the involvement of the round table, tavistock institute, royal institute of international relations etal?  Who are the bankers, business men, politicians and royalty involved in designing the new world order.  We want to know what is going on

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
